snippet: Ryan Miller made 41 saves, and Alexander Sulzer scored the tiebreaking goal midway through the third period for visiting Buffalo.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Buffalo Sabres beat New York Islanders, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Miller made 41 saves, and Alexander Sulzer scored the tiebreaking goal midway through the third period for visiting Buffalo.

headline.seo: Ryan Miller Makes 41 Saves in Sabres Win Over Islanders
headline.main: Miller Makes 41 Saves in Sabres’ Win Over Islanders
